title: Speed up Google Assistant by removing unused devices
content:
Do you feel that Google Assistant on your device has become a bit slower over time? The speed at which Google Assistant picks up your command and responds depends on multiple factors, including your phone’s hardware and network speed. It turns out there’s another factor that may impact the Assistant’s speed: having Google Assistant set

The post Speed up Google Assistant by removing unused devices appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Do you feel that Google Assistant on your smartphone has become a bit slower over time? Here's how to speed it up.
